welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Traverse City, where the charm of a small town meets the beauty of a lakeside paradise. Get ready to indulge in our famous cherries, explore our scenic views, and experience all the wonders this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cherry Capital Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Cherry Capital Airport primarily serves regional airlines and offers a more relaxed and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Antrim County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Antrim County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
